verbs.description: hedge funds [V: are] making historic bets that remind us of the dotcom bubble right before it burst hedge - fund speculation across equities bonds and commodities bears resemblance to the final stages of the dotcom bubble according to societe generale strategists they highlighted several markets in which hedge funds are making huge bets in one direction arthur van slooten doubleline funds treasurys us dotcom van slooten societe generale hedge société générale
